text: Mither: Yer lukin awfa braw in yer wee uniform.
Mither: How ye feeling, ye nervous fur yer furst day et the scuil?
Mither: Aye, am shair yer no.
Mither: Aw son, ye'll be fine, a ken ye'll make monie a pal.
Mither: Yer play-piece is in the kitchen. A've made ye a piece n jam and a've pit in a packet o Monster Munch anaw cos a ken it's yer favourite.
Mither: Yer faither wanted a wird wae ye anaw, a hink he's throu there tae.
Mither: His bunnet? It micht be in the cupboard.
Mither: Go see yer faither, he's in the kitchen.
